member.name: P:PVIMS.API.Infrastructure.Auth.JwtIssuerOptions.Issuer
member.summary: 4.1.1. "iss" (Issuer) Claim - The "iss" (issuer) claim identifies the principal that issued the JWT.

member.name: P:PVIMS.API.Infrastructure.Auth.JwtIssuerOptions.Subject
member.summary: 4.1.2. "sub" (Subject) Claim - The "sub" (subject) claim identifies the principal that is the subject of the JWT.

member.name: P:PVIMS.API.Infrastructure.Auth.JwtIssuerOptions.Audience
member.summary: 4.1.3. "aud" (Audience) Claim - The "aud" (audience) claim identifies the recipients that the JWT is intended for.

member.name: P:PVIMS.API.Infrastructure.Auth.JwtIssuerOptions.Expiration
member.summary: 4.1.4. "exp" (Expiration Time) Claim - The "exp" (expiration time) claim identifies the expiration time on or after which the JWT MUST NOT be accepted for processing.

member.name: P:PVIMS.API.Infrastructure.Auth.JwtIssuerOptions.NotBefore
member.summary: 4.1.5. "nbf" (Not Before) Claim - The "nbf" (not before) claim identifies the time before which the JWT MUST NOT be accepted for processing.

member.name: P:PVIMS.API.Infrastructure.Auth.JwtIssuerOptions.IssuedAt
member.summary: 4.1.6. "iat" (Issued At) Claim - The "iat" (issued at) claim identifies the time at which the JWT was issued.

member.name: P:PVIMS.API.Infrastructure.Auth.JwtIssuerOptions.ValidFor
member.summary: Set the timespan the token will be valid for (default is 150 min)

member.name: P:PVIMS.API.Infrastructure.Auth.JwtIssuerOptions.JtiGenerator
member.summary: "jti" (JWT ID) Claim (default ID is a GUID)

member.name: P:PVIMS.API.Infrastructure.Auth.JwtIssuerOptions.SigningCredentials
member.summary: The signing key to use when generating tokens.
